## IPhasedCommand.sessionAbortController property

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

An abort controller that can be used to abort the command. Long-lived plugins should listen to the signal to handle any cleanup logic.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly sessionAbortController: AbortController;
```
